definition: length of experience as a driver
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)

sentences.english: And equipped with more than a decade has experienced drivers.
sentences.chinese: 並配備有十年以上駕齡，經驗豐富的司機。

sentences.english: I: How many years have you had the driver's license?
sentences.chinese: 我已經有兩年的駕齡了。

sentences.english: My client is an experienced driver of more than 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 我的當事人是一個有20多年駕齡的老手。

sentences.english: A: I have two years driving experience.
sentences.chinese: 我已經有兩年的駕齡了。

sentences.english: By then she had already been driving for two years.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，她已經有兩年駕齡了。
